com.netflix.spectator.sandbox

Class HttpRequestBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.spectator.sandbox.HttpRequestBuilder

  • public class HttpRequestBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper for executing simple HTTP client requests using HttpURLConnection and logging via HttpLogEntry. This is mostly used for simple use-cases where it is undesirable to have additional dependencies on a more robust HTTP library.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HttpRequestBuilder(java.lang.String clientName, java.net.URI uri)
      Create a new instance for the specified URI.

        public HttpRequestBuilder compress()
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Compress the request body. The content must have already been set on the builder.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • withRetries

        public HttpRequestBuilder withRetries(int n)
        How many times to retry if the intial attempt fails?

      • withInitialRetryDelay

        public HttpRequestBuilder withInitialRetryDelay(long delay)
        How long to delay before retrying if the request is throttled. This will get doubled for each attempt that is throttled. Unit is milliseconds.

      • withHostnameVerifier

        public HttpRequestBuilder withHostnameVerifier(javax.net.ssl.HostnameVerifier verifier)
        Sets the policy used to verify hostnames when using HTTPS.

      • allowAllHosts

        public HttpRequestBuilder allowAllHosts()
        Specify that all hosts are allowed. Using this option effectively disables hostname verification. Use with caution.

      • withSSLSocketFactory

        public HttpRequestBuilder withSSLSocketFactory(javax.net.ssl.SSLSocketFactory factory)
        Sets the socket factory to use with HTTPS.
